185909264.review: Dishonored é simplesmente genial. O jogo te da uma liberdade imensa na hora de escolher as abordagens que você vai usar durante as missões, podendo ser de um jeito mais furtivo e não letal, ou metendo o loco e sentando a bala em todo mundo. 185886020.review:
Dishonored, developed by Arkane Studios and published by Bethesda Softworks, is a triumph of immersive storytelling and gameplay. Set in the plague-ridden, steampunk-inspired city of Dunwall, the game places players in the role of Corvo Attano, a royal bodyguard framed for the murder of the Empress. From the outset, the game captivates with its richly detailed world, blending Victorian aesthetics with fantastical elements like whale-oil-powered machinery and supernatural abilities. The setting isn't just a backdrop; it’s an integral part of the storytelling, inviting players to explore its dark alleys, sprawling estates, and towering fortresses.

The hallmark of Dishonored is its emphasis on player choice. Corvo's arsenal includes swords, pistols, crossbows, and a suite of supernatural powers granted by a mysterious figure known as the Outsider. Players can opt for a stealthy, non-lethal approach or embrace chaos with lethal combat. Powers like Blink, a short-range teleportation ability, and Possession, which allows Corvo to inhabit the bodies of animals or humans, open up countless possibilities for navigating levels. This freedom ensures that no two playthroughs feel the same, creating a highly personalized experience.

One of the most compelling aspects of Dishonored is its "Chaos system," which dynamically adjusts the game world based on the player’s actions. High-chaos playthroughs, marked by widespread killing and destruction, lead to a more oppressive atmosphere, with increased security and a darker ending. Conversely, low-chaos runs offer a more hopeful outcome. This system not only enhances replayability but also forces players to weigh the moral implications of their choices, adding emotional depth to the gameplay.

Dishonored excels in its visual and auditory presentation. The art style, with its painterly textures and exaggerated character designs, creates a unique aesthetic that sets it apart from other games of its era. Dunwall feels alive, with each district brimming with personality and detail. The sound design further enhances immersion, from the eerie creaks of abandoned buildings to the haunting whispers of the Outsider. Composer Daniel Licht’s atmospheric score perfectly complements the game’s tone, adding to the tension and emotional weight of Corvo’s journey.

While Dishonored is a stellar experience, it’s not without minor flaws. The story, while engaging, can feel somewhat predictable, and some players may find the stealth mechanics punishing if they stray from their intended path. However, these issues are overshadowed by the game’s strengths. With its innovative gameplay, reactive world, and captivating setting, Dishonored redefined what a first-person action-adventure game could achieve. It remains a must-play title, inspiring numerous sequels and solidifying its place as a classic in gaming history.

185819909.review:
It's a classic for a reason.

Great stealth gameplay, but you're not so fragile that you can't take a few hits when the situation gets hairy. The melee combat is okay, but I think it's not great on purpose as to de-incentivize brute-forcing your way through the missions.

Most of the powers feel really good and strong to use. All of them can be useful, and possessing people into messing up their pathing making them walk off a cliff will never not be fun.

The story is okay. The twist was pretty easy to foresee, but the comeback is satisfying.
The game does advertise the multiple endings thing, but as far as I know there's only really two depending on how much blood you spill. And the plot only really changes for the last 2 missions. Both are fun in their own rights, but the good ending makes the most sense to be canon in my opinion.

Not much else to say. Superb gameplay, great maps, decent plot. 7/10 would buy the DLC eventually.

185727104.review:
Dishonored - шикарная игра с ноткой Dying Light, Fallout и игр от Bethesda.

Плюсы:

Сюжет - он неплохой, но он мега предсказуемый.

Геймплей - шикарный, стелс, арбалеты, магия, паркур. Нет ощущения коридорности.

Локации - интересные и красивые.

Графика - ну вот вроде движок Unreal Engine, но некоторые пейзажи так и отдавали Fallout`ом. 

Персонажи - ну из самых мне понравившихся, я отмечу главного героя, Эмили и Антон Соколов конечно-же, Дауд очень сильно раскрылся в DLC. 

Саундтрек - неплохой, но не вау.

Оптимизация - на удивление, хорошая. Просто зная игры Беседки, я ожидал худшего результата.

Вариативность прохождения - ооо, здесь конструктор LEGO, это огромный плюс.

Атмосфера - шикарная.

Минусы:

Когда НПС стреляют или прицеливаются, они порой бессмертные словно, удары не проходят в ближнем бою.

Сюжет - я знал что нас предадут, ещё с середины игры понял, хз почему я так решил, прохождения на ютабе я не смотрел, и как-же я был чертовски прав!

Вариативность прохождения - странно что при высоком уровне Хаоса, почти все отворачиваются от главного героя, когда извините меня во времена Великобритании эти самые Бритиши делали и хуже дела, но в итоге уебаном оказался ТОЛЬКО главный герой. Т.е тот же Самуэль, он вконце ракетницей пальнул спалив нас, при этом все эти гниды как Мартин и т.п убили пол-лагеря в Песьей Яме, но гаднон ГГ... 

Графика - когда качества текстур на средних или минимум, невидно буквы или цифры, я это ещё в DLC с Даудом понял...

Смена языка в Windows - я не знаю почему, но когда запускаешь игру у меня пропадает значок ENG и РУС в панели задач и сочетание клавиш смены языка не меняет язык. Игра просто напросто забирает возможность сменить язык, даже когда я игру закрыл...

Отсутствие русского языка - это хорошо есть Руководства в котором сказано как установить русский язык, субтитры.

Итог: шикарная игра, рекомендую поиграть, проходил на одном дыхании.

185697696.review:
[b]“这儿是灰，那儿也是灰，好像整个世界都布满了灰。”——塞西莉亚[/b]

极佳的氛围与世界观塑造，维多利亚时代的蒸汽工业风格渗透在这座城市的每一个角落。
昏暗的下水道中，面目溃烂的情侣紧紧相拥，在死亡的冷拥中找到了唯一的慰藉。
阴霾的水域上庞大的捕鲸船缓缓驶过，被刀子刮的血肉模糊的鲸鱼尸体被吊起，红色的血液和粘稠的鲸脂顺着被肢解的伤口不断滴落，留下一片暗红色的痕迹。
城市的建筑群在烟囱吞吐的烟雾中显得苍白沉重，宏大的建筑群落下是成群的鼠疫患者和老鼠，高桥之上的士兵将一车车的尸体抛落，掌权者们在享受着金碧辉煌的奢华。
但顿沃高塔并没有高到闻不到地下尸体散发臭味的程度。

浓重的晨雾中，工厂的烟囱直指苍穹，吐着缭绕的白烟。
墙面斑驳的普拉切特仓库静默地矗立在岸边，褪色的鲸肉广告牌诉说着这座港口曾经的繁华。暮气沉沉的砖石建筑上，藤蔡悄然攀爬。                          
萨缪尔的小船悄然滑过浑浊的港湾，船上的科尔沃·阿塔诺紧了紧披风，沉默地望着这座工业城市的剪影。
不远处，旧港口区的狗圈酒馆已经亮起了灯，那是一切故事开始的地方。

————————评价分割线————————————

本作虽然画面贫瘠，却在人物刻画上见深意。
艾米莉送给科尔沃的画，一幅画像上稚嫩的笔触写下"dad"，另一幅女皇画像上则是"mom"。两个简单的词语瞬间揭示了科尔沃的三重身份：他不仅是忠诚的皇家护卫，更是不幸逝去的女皇的爱人，更是小艾米莉在风雨飘摇中最后的依靠。一下就让屏幕前的我马上沉入到为了爱与正义而进行的复国大业了.
即便他戴上了世上最骇人的面具，在艾米莉心中，他永远是那个最好的爸爸。
保皇党们的命运犹如一条盘旋而上的阶梯，从蛛网密布的陋巷酒馆，攀登到权力之巅，他们的心态变化极具特色。
心脏可以聆听别人的过往也很有趣，那些尘封往事，字里行间，暗流涌动。

此外，极具特色的混乱度设计虽然有些人认为是一种桎梏，让玩法变得单一无趣，但混乱度的设计实是一把照见本心的明镜，当一个人有了像神一样的能力，他是否会恣意妄为？在血色的复仇海洋中无尽沉沦呢？
科尔沃是否还记得贾思敏对他的期望，记得要守护这个国家呢？
把挡路的人全部杀掉就能解决一切问题吗？

而这个决定是由你来抉择的，你可以选择使用那些超凡的能力，那很有趣，会让旅程走得轻松写意，但有时候，选择一条艰难的道路，或许会让故事变得更有意义。
即使制作组为你设计了如此多的魔法般的超能力，
毕竟，你只想让这个故事有个童话般的结局嘛！

[b]“我很荣幸与你共事，先生”——萨谬尔[/b]

————————剧透分割线————————————

“我知道刺杀是见不得人的勾当。但有时候，好人会做些坏事来改正这个世界”——哈弗洛克海军上将
“科尔沃，你家族里是不是有贵族血统？我不会觉得惊讶的。”——潘德顿勋爵
“女皇死后很多贵族都站到了摄政王一边，毕竟这是最简单的选择。但是，对我来说，高贵的出身应该也要忠诚才行”——潘德顿勋爵
“科尔沃，这是我给你的画像，是你没戴着那顶可怕面具的样子。”——艾米莉给科尔沃画的素描
“因为我们相信你是那个可以改变这一切的人”——潘德顿勋爵
“他跟我的心贴得很近。我希望瘟疫之季能尽早结束。”——贾斯敏女皇
“我从来没相信杀死过女皇的人是你，科尔沃。她,是如此喜欢你——索科洛夫
“你尽可以在狗圈酒吧开杯畅饮。我们每年都重聚一次，怎么样？”——哈弗洛克海军上将
“萨谬尔，你看起来就像喝醉了一样！毒药起作用了吗？他死了没有？”——至高督军马丁
“我本来也是要死的，除了华莱士说我不会。潘德顿在拼命的道歉，说没人能知道他们干过的事，马丁在喝酒而且看起来很沮丧”——塞西莉亚
“我相信像哈弗洛克上将一样的人开始的意图是高尚的，还有马丁，甚至或许潘德顿，虽然我认为他只是懒。但没人意料到会如此接近这诱人的权力。”——索科洛夫
“我们几乎得到了这个帝国。但是现在，我的一切都输在了一个有着无坚不摧的利刃的男人手上，还是说他的剑使得其实并不快？”——摄政王哈弗洛克
“我告诉她了，在最后，我把所有的事情都告诉她了。从最开始时，我们还有着崇高理想的时候，到最后，我们被恐惧所操纵，不断和我们该相信谁，不得不杀了谁的秘密斗争时，为了谁当新的摄政王而争吵不休时。”——摄政王哈弗洛克

185681439.review:
Dishonored é um marco no gênero stealth-action. Ambientado na fascinante cidade de Dunwall, sua direção de arte única e atmosfera sombria são incríveis. A jogabilidade versátil permite abordagens criativas, seja como um assassino brutal ou um fantasma silencioso, e as habilidades sobrenaturais enriquecem a experiência.

A história de traição e vingança é envolvente, e o sistema de "caos" torna suas escolhas impactantes. Os níveis são obras-primas de design, oferecendo caminhos alternativos e segredos que incentivam a exploração. A trilha sonora e a dublagem adicionam profundidade à imersão, enquanto a rejogabilidade garante que cada partida seja única.

185440028.review:
Very very very good game hampered by weak audio design, which is a real problem in a thief-like game, and the pile of trash that was Unreal Engine 3.
Other than that, it's worst sin is something that sounds like a nitpick but has caused me to waste hours and hours because of how unclear it was.
So, like most games, enemies have detection levels, they can kinda see you without being suspicious, they can get suspicious and start to look for you, they can fully aggro you, etc.
Except, in most games, there is a loud sound that plays when an enemy aggros you, but in this one, the sound plays when the enemy gets suspicious. But this difference is not well communicated.
So what happens is that you play it, you try to be a sneaky stealthy goblin, and you keep reloading your quicksave because whenever an enemy sniffs a hint of your presence you hear that sound and you think you've been discovered. But, actually, that's not the case, the sound played just to tell you that an enemy was about to see you, which, like, there's already a HUD element for that. It's bafflingly dumb that they went with this approach, it adds nothing to the game and is just confusing

185052060.review:
[h1]🔪 Dishonored : L'Art de la Lame et des Ombres 🕯️[/h1]
[p]Temps de jeu : Environ 12 heures pour une première run, mais beaucoup plus si vous voulez explorer chaque ruelle de Dunwall et découvrir tous ses secrets. Et croyez-moi, les rats auront le temps de vous observer.[/p]
[p]Genre : Immersive sim avec un mélange savoureux de furtivité, action, et pouvoirs surnaturels.[/p]

[h2]Les points positifs :[/h2]
[p]🌆 Un univers riche et sombre : Dunwall est un chef-d’œuvre dystopique. Inspirée de l’Angleterre victorienne, elle mélange noblesse décadente, peste ravageuse, et technologie steampunk alimentée à l’huile de baleine. Une ville qui semble respirer, ou plutôt suffoquer, sous sa crasse et ses complots.[/p]
[p]🔮 Des pouvoirs uniques : Offerts par l’énigmatique Outsider, vos capacités incluent la téléportation (Blink), la possession, et le contrôle des rats. Des outils parfaits pour transformer chaque assassinat en œuvre d'art… ou en carnage magistral.[/p]
[p]🎭 Une liberté d'approche totale : Vous pouvez infiltrer une fête masquée en jouant les ombres ou réduire vos ennemis en poussière. Chaque mission est un puzzle ouvert où votre créativité est récompensée.[/p]

[h2]Les points négatifs :[/h2]
[p]🔄 Un scénario parfois prévisible : Si les intrigues de trahison sont fascinantes, certains retournements peuvent être anticipés, surtout pour les amateurs de récits politiques.[/p]
[p]🧭 Une carte parfois déroutante : L’absence d’indications trop précises peut perdre certains joueurs, mais cela renforce aussi l’exploration.[/p]

[h2]Le prix :[/h2]
[p]Proposé autour de 10€ (et souvent moins en promotion), Dishonored est un joyau incontournable pour ceux qui aiment les jeux immersifs et les récits riches en détails.[/p]

[h2]🏆 Le platine :[/h2]
[p]Ah, le fameux trophée "Fantôme" : terminez le jeu sans jamais tuer ni vous faire détecter. Une épreuve de patience et de perfection qui peut prendre jusqu’à 25 heures pour les perfectionnistes. Bonne chance avec vos nerfs (et vos sauvegardes) ![/p]


[p]En résumé, Dishonored est un chef-d'œuvre qui combine une liberté d’action totale avec un univers unique, sombre et riche en détails. Une expérience marquante, que vous soyez un assassin discret ou un tourbillon de destruction. Alors, masquez-vous, invoquez les rats, et plongez dans les ombres de Dunwall. 🐀🔪[/p]

184754627.review:
第一人称的潜行游戏我只玩过这一个，在以前接触这类游戏之前，我的经验只有《hitman》和《细胞分裂》系列，这作跟前两个完全不同。
对我来说，潜行游戏也是解谜的一种，只不过他给了你半开放的形式让你去寻找，去解决。

从结局上来看，整体的游戏基调是倾向于让你一枪不杀，从头扮演一个“神秘刺客”，前面关卡的评价会影响到后面的难度（暴露次数过多会增加守卫，杀人过多老鼠会变多），在设计上，一周目你是基本没有办法达成一人不杀的，而前几关的失误不断滚雪球，在后面只能大开杀戒，落了个坏结局，二周目开始了解大概路线之后就好玩了。

那么作为潜行游戏，他最重要的“游戏性”表现的如何呢？很多又很少。从我的个人游玩体验来说，达成“完美”条件仅一条路线，而宰几个也没问题的条件下，路线会变得异常的多，除去传统的环境击杀，道具引路之外，这款游戏独有的“附身”和“召唤”给这游戏的路线增加了不少。多周目体验你完全可以用不同的方法区达成目标。

184580050.review:
Évaluation : 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 (5/5)
"Dishonored : Une œuvre d’art immersive mêlant furtivité et liberté d’action."

Dishonored, développé par Arkane Studios et édité par Bethesda Softworks, est un jeu qui brille par son mélange de gameplay innovant, son univers steampunk captivant et son histoire riche en nuances. Sorti en 2012, ce chef-d'œuvre reste une référence pour les amateurs de jeux d’action-infiltration. Avec sa direction artistique unique et ses multiples approches possibles, Dishonored offre une expérience inoubliable.

Les Points Forts :
✅ Un univers riche et détaillé :
Dunwall, la ville fictive de Dishonored, est un monde steampunk magnifiquement conçu, mêlant influences victoriennes et technologies industrielles. Chaque ruelle, bâtiment, et quartier fourmille de détails qui racontent l’histoire d’une cité ravagée par la peste et corrompue par des élites avides de pouvoir. L’immersion est totale, et l’ambiance sombre et oppressante est renforcée par une direction artistique exceptionnelle.

✅ Une liberté d’approche totale :
Dishonored excelle en donnant aux joueurs le choix. Chaque mission peut être accomplie de multiples façons : en toute discrétion sans tuer un seul ennemi ou en plongeant dans un chaos sanglant. Grâce aux pouvoirs octroyés par l’Outsider (comme Clignement, qui permet de se téléporter, ou Possession, pour prendre le contrôle d’autres êtres vivants), les possibilités sont presque infinies. Ce gameplay ouvert encourage la créativité et récompense l’exploration.

✅ Une histoire captivante :
Vous incarnez Corvo Attano, le garde du corps de l’impératrice injustement accusé de son meurtre. L’intrigue, bien que simple en apparence, se densifie à mesure que vous découvrez les secrets de Dunwall et que vous affrontez vos ennemis. Les thèmes de trahison, de vengeance et de choix moraux donnent du poids à chaque décision. De plus, le système de chaos, qui modifie le monde en fonction de vos actions (pacifiques ou violentes), ajoute une profondeur narrative.

✅ Des personnages mémorables :
Chaque allié et antagoniste que vous croisez est bien écrit et contribue à enrichir l’histoire. De L’Outsider, une entité mystérieuse et quasi divine, à vos cibles corrompues, chaque interaction laisse une empreinte marquante.

✅ Un gameplay fluide et intuitif :
Les contrôles sont précis, et chaque pouvoir ou arme se combine parfaitement avec les mécaniques de furtivité et d’action. Que vous vous faufiliez dans les ombres ou que vous affrontiez des gardes en combat direct, le gameplay est toujours gratifiant.

Les Points Faibles :
⚠️ Une campagne un peu courte :
La campagne principale peut être terminée en environ 10 à 12 heures, ce qui peut sembler bref pour certains. Cependant, la rejouabilité élevée (grâce aux multiples approches possibles et aux différentes fins) compense largement cette durée.

⚠️ IA parfois inégale :
L’intelligence artificielle des ennemis, bien que correcte, peut parfois être incohérente. Par exemple, ils peuvent passer d’une vigilance extrême à une cécité apparente selon les situations.

⚠️ Certains pouvoirs sous-exploités :
Bien que la palette de pouvoirs soit impressionnante, certains, comme Vents Déchaînés, sont moins utiles comparés à des incontournables comme Clignement ou Possession.

En conclusion :
Dishonored est un joyau du genre action-infiltration, offrant une liberté rarement égalée et une immersion totale dans un monde fascinant. Sa direction artistique unique, son gameplay flexible et son histoire mémorable en font un classique intemporel. Que vous soyez un adepte de la furtivité ou que vous préfériez semer le chaos, Dishonored saura vous captiver.

🎮 Verdict final :
Un must-play pour tous les amateurs de jeux narratifs et immersifs. Avec son univers riche et ses mécaniques innovantes, Dishonored laisse une empreinte durable dans le cœur des joueurs.

⏳ Temps de jeu recommandé :

Première partie : 10 à 12 heures.
Rejouabilité : Au moins deux autres runs pour explorer les différentes approches et fins.
✨ Note personnelle : Un jeu qui mérite d’être revisité, même des années après sa sortie. Un classique incontournable.

184492810.review:
I first played Dishonored about 10 years ago. I still had my original save from 2014 when I last replayed it.

[h2]Gameplay[/h2]

Despite the tags, it does not play like Assassin's Creed at all; more like Metal Gear or Far Cry.  There's little "stealthing through crowds" and more "looting buildings, sneaking around unsuspected" or "full-on Rambo". You follow the protagonist Corvo, as he yearns to clear his name, and strike justice to those who—wait, or is it? No, it's about doing it how [i]you[/i] want. [b]You can choose to play the game however you like[/b]. Follow the story through a handful of linear missions, and reach the conclusion [i]you[/i] manifested. The way you play the game directly influences how the game treats you back.

[h2]Quality[/h2]

Dishonored is designed very well. Every single aspect of the game is well thought out, from the level layouts, to the NPC dialog. All the important aspects have curated detail, while the others have cute charm/self-aware humor to cover up their shortcomings. 

[h2]Level Design[/h2]

When I first played Dishonored as a teen, I struggled with getting through the levels without killing/subduing every single enemy. As an adult (with ever-so-slightly more brainpower), I realized that there were [i]other[/i] ways to get to my objectives. Most of the times I asked "hmm, I wonder if I can just climb over that roof instead", the answer was a clear "YES".

That layout of the levels feels extremely well thought out. They are "closed world", but they feel [b]open[/b] & [b]connected[/b] enough to not feel [i]constricting[/i].

[h2]Mechanics[/h2]

If you are an avid quick-saver, this is it. The game gives you the tools to solve literally [i]every[/i] interaction however you want. —And trust me, there are a billion ways to skin a cat. Want to avoid enemies? Upgrade teleport and jump over rooftops. Enjoy sneaking around unnoticed? Upgrade your x-ray vision. Enjoy doing kung-foo like Neo in the Matrix? Upgrade your time-bending power. Want to beat people only by throwing random items from the ground? [b]THERE ARE UPGRADES FOR THAT![/b]

[h2]Post-Game Content[/h2]

Dishonored has DLC, but no NG+. DLC #1 adds a "trials" mode (à la boss rush) which lets you either train your skills, or exercise the ever- loving s*** out of your power fantasy/lack of emotional regulation. However, the quality of the DLC is absolutely dog-water, and somehow manages to highlight the worst of the games mechanics, all of its limitations,  and bugs.

DLC #2 & 3 are a lot of fun. They expand on the existing story in a creative way (without introducing more open-ended loose-ends), let you explore more abilities, and give you more gameplay, and let you explore even more of Dunwall & its rich story.

[h2]Performance[/h2]

Runs fine on absolutely anything. It literally ran on my 3rd gen Intel i3 from over 10 years ago, no problems.

[h2]Final Notes[/h2]

If you haven't picked up Dishonored yet, just do it. As of writing this, I think both 1 & 2 are on sale for <$10.

Achievement hunters steer clear; this game with make you cry tears of pain.

A lot of people will tell you a lot of good about this game, and they're not wrong.

Dishonored is one of several great games from Arkane studios, and while it's 12 years old now, it holds up like few games do. 

Certainly it's a little clunky at times, and certainly half the upgrades are useless if you're going for low chaos, but if you work with the game, if you come to understand the rhythm it wants you to work at it becomes an experience that's almost as smooth as butter. Just make sure to save often, not because the game is unstable or anything but in my experience there's a whole bunch of things your powers let you just, barely, do and sometimes you'll have to reload because the game was only pretending like Blink would actually get you up there.

Overall though, it's an incredible stealth game that gives you just a ton to play with. And for the price it now retails. It's almost as much a steal as all the money people leave lying around in this game.

Well, I'm off now to play dishonored 2 and then death of the outsider, and I'm sure I'll like them just as much if not more. Have a good day, and I hope you'll like the game.

184330263.review:
Whenever you think of Arkane studios the first game that will always pop up is Dishonered and its not hard to see why, Dishonered is an action stealth action game with a heavy focus on Open ended game design and immersive sim elements.

[h1] The Good [/h1]
[b] Open ended game design [/b] the game pretty much gives you freedom to tackle all problems the way you want which is a far cry compared to most triple A games where you can only solve a certain problem in a certain way otherwise the game will tell you no, Dishonred does the exact opposite of this, want to turn an enemy secrutiy measure to your advantage? you can! want to posses a rat and enter a building via a small hole? you can! and the game constantly surprises you with how you can interact with it and these guys pretty much nailed this aspect of the game.

[b] Fantastic Level Design [/b] The level design in this game is excellent and puts pretty much the majority of triple A games to shame! not only is the gameplay design open ended but the levels themselves are also open ended aswell with fantastic atmosphere and full of amazing shortcuts and interconnected levels that even rivals some of the best fromsoft levels. 

[b] Great set of abilities [/b] While they may be unbalanced the game cares more about the player having fun than limiting them in the name of balance.

[b] Great worldbuilding, Lore and art direction [/b] The setting has a mix of victorian and fantastical elements with excellent atmosphere and near flawless environmental storytelling, the art mixes realism with painterly asthetic giving character designs a unique look that you wont find in many games, while i did not really like the story the npc interaction and in game text are very solid.

[h1] The Bad [/h1]

[b] Weak Story [/b] The story is kinda all over the place with so much inconsistencies and weak character writing its not terrible to the point where it damages the game but it does not enhance it either.

[b] Chaos System [/b] Really hate this type of game design, games like thief knew how to discourage not to kill enemies and that it because it creates too much noise, this game on the other hand gives you the best and most fun tools and for some reason expects you not to use it in order not to get the bad ending, its horrible design choice and its even worse with how the game shames you, as if the game is full of complex and innocent characters. 

[h1] Overall [/h1]
Dishonred is the real Thief spiritual sequel and it shows how amazing immersive sim elements can be and while the writing and chaos system leaves a lot to be desired, with fantastic open ended game design, excellent level design and fantastic world, dishonered stand among some of the best stealth games out there and a must play to anyone who enjoys stealth games or open ended games.

184234076.review:
Dishonored was something I wasn't expecting to take up so much of my interest over the past 4-5 days. Once I finished the first mission I knew that there was something special here. The stealth/combat mix is done to perfection, its never felt so tempting to ruin your entire stealth run just to use your (albeit kinda small) arsenal of bombs, guns, powers, weapons. However its actually insane the amount of kill variety you can get out of these handful of options (literally an achievement to kill someone with essentially a bomb strapped to a rat lmao). I was also really loving the difference you can get from low and high chaos runs in world building, story changes and character interaction. Depending on if you decide to go around murdering everyone or just sticking to stealth the story can change in some pretty significant ways I felt. One thing though that might be a let down is that the story isn't all that deep and the voice acting isn't anything to write home about. Regardless I still very much liked the characters and didn't mind the simplicity of the story. The 3 dlc definitely cements this as I almost enjoyed it more than the main game. After finishing Knife of Dunall and Brigmore Witches Daud was up there as one of my favorite characters in the game. And even with how much shit 'Dunwall City Trials' gets I still very much loved the challenges it gave me and how tough it was to grind for the achievements (Still have not recovered from 'By My Hand Alone' and 'Daredevil'). 
I would say that you can't miss Dishonored if your a fan of Action Stealth games, as this was a definitely a contender for top 10 for me, as well as a favorite game of the year. 
8.5/10, the quote 'Your such a choffer' will always live in my head rent free.

183942971.review:
Dishonored é um daqueles jogos que deixam uma marca duradoura, te transportando para um mundo onde a liberdade de escolha e as consequências das suas ações realmente importam.

Ao adentrar a cidade de Dunwall, você é imediatamente imerso em uma atmosfera sombria e opressiva, marcada por uma praga devastadora e uma luta pelo poder. A estética steampunk é não apenas visualmente deslumbrante, mas também cria um ambiente único onde cada canto esconde segredos e histórias esperando para serem descobertas.

Você joga como Corvo Attano, um guarda-costas injustamente acusado de assassinar a imperatriz que jurou proteger. O sentimento de injustiça e a busca por redenção se tornam motores poderosos para sua jornada. A narrativa é envolvente, e a dualidade entre vingança e misericórdia se reflete nas escolhas que você faz ao longo do jogo.

A jogabilidade de Dishonored é um verdadeiro destaque. Você tem à sua disposição uma variedade de habilidades sobrenaturais, gadgets e armas, permitindo uma abordagem furtiva ou agressiva, conforme seu estilo preferido. Cada missão pode ser completada de várias maneiras, e a sensação de liberdade é tão gratificante quanto rara em jogos desse gênero. Quer você decida deslizar pelas sombras ou enfrentar seus inimigos de frente, o jogo se adapta às suas decisões, e cada caminho oferece uma experiência única.

As mecânicas de escolha e consequência são profundas e impactantes. Suas ações afetam o mundo ao seu redor, influenciando o estado de Dunwall e o destino de seus habitantes. Essa interconectividade faz com que cada decisão, desde poupar um inimigo até encontrar rotas alternativas, tenha um peso significativo e uma repercussão tangível.

Graficamente, Dishonored é um espetáculo visual. A direção de arte, com seu estilo pictórico e uso de paletas de cores sombrias e vibrantes, cria uma atmosfera que é ao mesmo tempo bela e melancólica. A trilha sonora e os efeitos sonoros complementam a ambientação, reforçando a tensão e a emoção em cada momento do jogo.

Dishonored é mais do que um simples jogo de ação e aventura; é uma obra-prima interativa que oferece uma profundidade emocional e uma complexidade de narrativa que poucos jogos conseguem alcançar. É um convite para explorar um mundo ricamente construído, onde suas escolhas moldam a história de forma profunda e significativa.

Em resumo, Dishonored é um jogo imperdível para quem aprecia uma boa história, jogabilidade dinâmica e a liberdade de jogar da forma que quiser. É uma experiência que permanece com você muito depois dos créditos finais, um verdadeiro testamento ao poder dos jogos de contar histórias de maneiras únicas e cativantes.

183912152.review: Dishonoured is a masterpiece of level design. Seeing the splitting paths and side missions makes the world feel alive and fluid. The chaos system changing levels based on your playstyle adds another level of immersion and means that no playthrough is truly the same. The puzzles are fun, the combat is engaging and very satisfying when you have mastered it. The story is good and the different ways of taking out targets gives you a lot more freedom to play how you want to play. You can go all out on stealth or go in guns blazing. No matter which one you pick, you will have fun with this game. Dishonoured will go down as one of the classics so play it if you haven't already, you won't regret it.

183905593.review:
Ein spaßiges Schleich-Action-Spiel mit sehr vielen Herangehensweisen oder – wie man es auch nennen kann – das bessere „Thief“. Den zweiten Dishonored-Teil habe ich davor bereits gespielt, der war großartig.

Die Kaiserin ist tot und ihre Tochter entführt, der Protagonist im Untergrund. Er wird des Mordes beschuldigt, ist jedoch unschuldig und kämpft sich nun wahlweise tödlich oder nicht-tödlich durch mehrere Missionen. Das neue Regime nach dem Putsch soll mit seinen roten Bannern überall glasklar eine Na𝗓i-Referenz darstellen, zum Glück aber ohne nervige Belehrungsversuche, wie es sie bei anderen Spielen heutzutage gibt.

Schon im Prolog kann man mit der jungen zukünftigen Kaiserin Verstecken spielen und lernt damit schnell die Grundlagen, ein cleverer Trick. Auch die späteren Missionen bieten einige Abwechslung mit optionalen Nebenmissionen, etwa die der schrulligen Lumpengräfin. Eine lustige Idee ist die wörtlich genommene Handmassage in der Bordell-Mission, die man durch die Schlüssellöcher beobachten kann.

Das Gameplay ist gut ausgearbeitet und fürs Stealth-Genre recht schnell, denn man kann sich durch Upgrades zahlreiche magische Kräfte aneignen und damit entweder zügig die Fliege machen oder die für diese Zeit durchaus genüsslichen Todesszenen bewundern. Das Cyborg-Herz, das man zum Finden von Artefakten herumträgt, kann einem zu den meisten Umgebungen und Personen Zusatzfakten liefern, was darüber hinaus aber kaum Relevanz hat.

Ultrawide-Auflösung und die auch heute noch ansprechende, halbrealistische Comic-Grafik im Stil von Borderlands geben dem Spiel einen recht zeitlosen Reiz. Nur die teils verbesserungsfähige Wegfindung von Charakteren und die zugegebenermaßen mittelmäßige deutsche Synchro zeugen vom tatsächlichen Alter dieses ersten Teils. Es handelt sich um eine sogenannte Skyrim-Synchro – mehr als die Hälfte der männlichen Sprechrollen werden von Bernd Vollbrecht vertont, sodass er bei Gesprächen von Wachen oft mit sich selbst redet. Das zieht sich leider durch das gesamte Spiel und beide DLC-Geschichten.

Ich habe sowohl das Hauptspiel als auch die DLC-Storys zweimal durchgespielt, denn es gibt ein gutes und schlechtes Ende, respektive einen niedrigen und hohen Chaosfaktor, je nach Anzahl der Tötungen.

Gespielte Fassung: Windows-Version mit deutscher Synchro unter Arch Linux.
Vervollständigung: Any%
Errungenschaften: 63 %

183548370.review:
[h1]權力腐化人心，惡意滋養災禍，背離引來殺神[/h1]
● 非常好玩的潛行遊戲，劇情豐富，制敵手段繁多，行進路線自由且精妙，不殺人更能體驗到地圖設計的趣味性。
● 2012年發行的遊戲，模型貼圖明顯較為粗糙，但以鼠疫為背景，加上黑魔法和未來工業的美術風格，其衰敗、晦暗又有點科幻的氛圍，玩久了依然很有沉浸感。
● 混亂度高低會影響鼠疫嚴重度和結局走向，我很喜歡Emily的畫作風格也會隨之改變這點。
● 我最喜歡的細節是機械心臟，會訴說一些場景或人物信息，而這些資訊能拼湊出心臟的來源，想到來源和主角的人物關係，真是既震撼又別出心裁的設定。
● DLC 1全是挑戰關卡，全成就要花時間磨練技術，DLC 2、3是以Daud為主角的故事，並帶出後兩代遊戲的主要角色。
● 把敵人塞進垃圾箱蓋上蓋子，其他人巡邏經過還是會發現，垃圾居然不是丟進垃圾箱裡嗎？

[b]★ 推薦度：9/10 [/b]

➤ 適合喜歡潛行動作冒險遊戲者
